name: Best Left Forgotten (Demo)
description:
WARNING
The following game may contain: Graphical images, blood, violence and grotesque imagery and disturbing facts. Young children and those who may have a problem with these things should refrain from progressing further. 
You Have been warned!

You play as Syd Gray who is a FBI agent, he and his co-worker Jaxson Drevux are sent to a abandoned laboratory to investigate the recent murders that have occurred there  over the past several weeks. Upon investigating the place it turns out this lab isn't what it was made out to be, but something darker then normal.

I had a bit of help from some friends and some amazing free music on Youtube to make this demo, the official game  will be released in the future  with original music, and much more so for anyone who plays this demo please leave a comment and let us know what you think of the story by far. Thank you 

Edit 06/12/2020:
Fixed some text and wall clippings, if anyone else can find anymore walls that are broken please let me know, I fixed most of them the best I could so I think I got them all!
